sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 Two isosceles triangles have equal vertical angles and their areas are in the ratio \(4:1\).
 Find the ratio of their corresponding heights.\\ 
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{Let ABC and PQR be two isosceles triangles such that} AB=AC, PQ = PR, \angle A = \angle P \\$$
 $$ \dfrac{area of \Delta ABC}{area of \Delta PQR} = \dfrac{\input[s1v1]{}}{\input[s1v2]{}}\\$$"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{Draw perpendicular AD on BC and PM on QR.}\\$$
 $$\text{Now, AB = AC and PQ = PR.}\\$$
 $$\dfrac{\input[s2v1]{}}{\input[s2v2]{}} = \dfrac{AC}{PR}\\$$
 $$\Delta ABC \sim \Delta PQR\\$$"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{As the triangle is Similar, the ratio of their area is equal to ratio of square of their any two corresponding sides.\\}$$
 $$\dfrac{area of \Delta ABC}{area of \Delta PQR} = \dfrac{{AD}^2}{{PM}^2}\\$$
 $$\Rightarrow \left(\dfrac{4}{1}\right) = \left(\dfrac{AD}{PM}\right)^2\\$$
 $$\Rightarrow AD : PM = \input[s3v1]{} : \input[s3v2]{}.\\$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [4, 1], "text": "$$\text{Assuming as given in the question, ABC and PQR be two isosceles triangles, with}$$ $$ \dfrac{area of \Delta ABC}{area of \Delta PQR} = \dfrac{4}{1}\\$$"}, {"data": ["AB", "PQ"], "text": "$$\text{Since, AB = AC, dividing both sides by PQ, since PQ = PR, }$$ $$\text{therefore, }\dfrac{AB}{PQ} = \dfrac{AC}{PR}$$ $$\text{, and hence, }\Delta ABC \sim \Delta PQR$$"}, {"data": [2, 1], "text": "$$\left(\dfrac{4}{1}\right) = \left(\dfrac{AD}{PM}\right)^2\\$$
 $$\text{therefore,} AD : PM = 2 : 1.\\$$ "}]
